# Key Differences in Mining Station 14
- Spacing in this sector is significantly more deadly.
- Generators require fuel to produce power.
- Electrical equipment produce heat, which must be dealt with to prevent machine overheating and failure.
- Unsafe mining practices may lead to mining collapses ("cave-ins"). See the guide to [color=#a4885c]Mining Safety[/color].
- Many more items are available for purchase from the cargo catalog.
- Chemistry is more challenging but also more in depth - dispenser start with limited chemicals but there are multiple ways to get them including breaking down other chemicals with the CentriMax 2000!
- Crew must take their health more seriously, as things like overeating, smoking, ingesting or breathing poison, or taking too much medicine can lead to organ failure! - Fortunately the health analyzer will inform of these ailments and synthetic organs are available for purchase!
- Bionics are also available for purchase, just make sure there is licensed surgeon on hand to help you install them!
